mapper.select: SELECT t1.rental_home_no, t1.member_no as reporter_no, t1.report_category_no, t1.state, t1.created_date, t2.rental_home_report_name as category_name FROM rental_home_report t1 INNER JOIN rental_home_report_category t2 on t1.report_category_no = t2.rental_home_report_no ORDER BY t1.created_date desc
